roleset.name: orient again
roleset.note: REORIENT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reorient' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from reorient.01-v predicate notes)
REORIENTATION-N NOTES: Based on temprel and stratified data. Comparison to reorient.01. Framed by Katie. (from reorientation.01-n)

example.name: the one example
example.text: But [many of them]-1 can be quite profoundly reoriented [*-1]by productive and disciplined service.

example.name: both args
example.text: The patient's frequent reorientation to time and place
